Title: Requires that all public housing contracts entered into by the division of housing and community renewal and municipal housing authorities be disclosed on the division of housing and community renewal's website
Summary: Requires that all public housing contracts entered into by the division of housing and community renewal and municipal housing authorities be disclosed on the division of housing and community renewal's website so that such public housing contracts are available to the public.
LawCode: Amd ยง14, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to requiring contracts entered into by the division of housing and community renewal and municipal housing authorities be available to the public
